messageParts: [valibot](https://valibot.dev/guides/mental-model/)中的概念
`#` 查询根级配置

4113782251005630579.text:
`..` 查询父级
> 任何情况下`['aa']`都表示查询当前级别的自己为`aa`的控件,所以如果要查询同级别的控件,需要`['..','aa']`
messageParts:
`..` 查询父级
> 任何情况下`['aa']`都表示查询当前级别的自己为`aa`的控件,所以如果要查询同级别的控件,需要`['..','aa']`
4113782251005630579.target:
`..` Query parent level  
> In any case, `['aa']` represents querying the control whose name is `aa` at the current level. Therefore, if you want to query controls at the same level, you need to use `['..','aa']`.

1395061638591271723.text:
`@xx` 查询别名为`xx`的控件
> 当创建了一个数组项时,别名会创建一个单独的Map保存,如果查询不到的情况下,才会查询父级
messageParts:
`@xx` 查询别名为`xx`的控件
> 当创建了一个数组项时,别名会创建一个单独的Map保存,如果查询不到的情况下,才会查询父级
1395061638591271723.target:
`@xx` queries the control with the alias `xx`  
> When an array item is created, the alias creates a separate Map to store it. Only if the query fails, it will then query the parent.

2340391657337809349.text: 客户端与服务端的元数据定义不会产生冲突,可以将不同场景的元数据定义在一块,统一验证和类型,减少沟通成本
messageParts: 客户端与服务端的元数据定义不会产生冲突,可以将不同场景的元数据定义在一块,统一验证和类型,减少沟通成本
2340391657337809349.target: The metadata definitions between the client and server will not conflict, allowing metadata definitions from different scenarios to be grouped together, with unified validation and types, thereby reducing communication costs.

messageParts: 客户端介绍

4268176488185084713.text: 小部分场景因为视图和逻辑分离,所以需要使用静态解析,将定义先解析为对应模板并写入文件,再配合动态解析赋值
messageParts: 小部分场景因为视图和逻辑分离,所以需要使用静态解析,将定义先解析为对应模板并写入文件,再配合动态解析赋值
4268176488185084713.target: In some small scenarios, static parsing is required because the view and logic are separated. The definitions are first parsed into corresponding templates and written to files, then combined with dynamic parsing for assignment.

messageParts: 嵌套定义

5413246865473526746.text: 市面上绝大多数的表单,都没有类型,往往设计表单后,还需要重新写一个类型来对输入输出进行约束
messageParts: 市面上绝大多数的表单,都没有类型,往往设计表单后,还需要重新写一个类型来对输入输出进行约束
5413246865473526746.target: Most of the forms available on the market lack types. Often, after designing a form, you still need to write a type separately to constrain the input and output.

messageParts: 布局移动

3809920437268872967.text: 希望未来代码拥有不同框架的可迁移性
messageParts: 希望未来代码拥有不同框架的可迁移性
3809920437268872967.target: Hope that future code will have transferability across different frameworks.

374306519133786673.text: 平台无关,同一个定义可以可以被多个框架使用
messageParts: 平台无关,同一个定义可以可以被多个框架使用
374306519133786673.target: Platform-agnostic, the same definition can be used by multiple frameworks.

567250261954736802.text: 当前后端均使用js开发时,往往遇到一个问题,就是后端的类型已经定义,但是后端返回的接口往往只有`interface`/`type`,更甚者可能连类型都没有,只是告诉有哪些字段
messageParts: 当前后端均使用js开发时,往往遇到一个问题,就是后端的类型已经定义,但是后端返回的接口往往只有`interface`/`type`,更甚者可能连类型都没有,只是告诉有哪些字段
567250261954736802.target: When both the frontend and backend are developed using JavaScript, a common issue often arises: although the backend has already defined types, the actual API responses from the backend usually only provide `interface`/`type`, and in some cases, there may not even be any type definitions, only indicating which fields are present.

3382540454341591138.text: 当前后端或者其他输入解析也需要此验证时,建议使用
messageParts: 当前后端或者其他输入解析也需要此验证时,建议使用
3382540454341591138.target: It is recommended to use this verification when front-end, back-end, or other input parsing also requires it.

messageParts: 当前支持

7364950739177326435.text: 当表单部分字段在某些场景可以/不可以被填写时使用

7364950739177326435.target: Use when certain fields in a form can or cannot be filled in certain scenarios.

当需要调整多个组件的布局,样式及相关显示时,就需要分组
> `object`/`intersect`/`union`/`tuple`/`array`类型时可使用
messageParts:
当需要调整多个组件的布局,样式及相关显示时,就需要分组
> `object`/`intersect`/`union`/`tuple`/`array`类型时可使用
5446537984736255754.target:
When it is necessary to adjust the layout, style, and related display of multiple components, grouping is required.  
> Can be used when working with `object`/`intersect`/`union`/`tuple`/`array` types.

8188504147277309000.target: When validation is more complex and needs to be handled on the current control, it is recommended to use

messageParts: 快速开始

9089392007205821708.text: 您也可以自定义object组件,修改显示方式
messageParts: 您也可以自定义object组件,修改显示方式
9089392007205821708.target: You can also customize the object component and modify the display method.

4765646126677866654.text: 您可以简单的理解为元数据设置
messageParts: 您可以简单的理解为元数据设置
4765646126677866654.target: You can simply understand it as metadata settings.

9064739616984463993.text: 所有库/框架都实现了最基础的`PiyingViewGroup`,但这个并没有任何样式,排版,所以往往需要按要求自定义
messageParts: 所有库/框架都实现了最基础的`PiyingViewGroup`,但这个并没有任何样式,排版,所以往往需要按要求自定义
9064739616984463993.target: All libraries/frameworks implement the most basic `PiyingViewGroup`, but this has no styling or layout, so it is often necessary to customize it according to specific requirements.

1047498010145358144.text: 所有的设置操作,都是基于`rawConfig`封装,该方法允许修改很多底层设置,方便开发者自行定义
messageParts: 所有的设置操作,都是基于`rawConfig`封装,该方法允许修改很多底层设置,方便开发者自行定义
1047498010145358144.target: All configuration operations are based on `rawConfig`, which allows modifying many low-level settings and enables developers to define their own configurations freely.

5465334838190556816.text: 所有要使用的组件,最好都在配置中先进行注册,方便引用
messageParts: 所有要使用的组件,最好都在配置中先进行注册,方便引用
5465334838190556816.target: All components to be used are best registered in the configuration first, for easier reference.

3527678917567115449.text: 此功能在组件中也可以使用,由于组件中不需要考虑类型,所以很容易进行各种排版;但是表单中往往是数据结构与视图布局不一致,这时候就需要在保证数据结构正常的前提下,移动组件
messageParts: 此功能在组件中也可以使用,由于组件中不需要考虑类型,所以很容易进行各种排版;但是表单中往往是数据结构与视图布局不一致,这时候就需要在保证数据结构正常的前提下,移动组件
3527678917567115449.target: This feature can also be used in components. Since components do not need to consider types, it is easy to perform various layouts. However, in forms, the data structure often does not match the view layout. In such cases, we need to move components while ensuring the data structure remains normal.

7815048335453190777.text:
此方法也支持直接指定组件定义,但是不推荐,因为会让维护变的困难
> 除非此组件仅在此地方使用并且只使用一次,否则还是建议先注册再使用
messageParts:
此方法也支持直接指定组件定义,但是不推荐,因为会让维护变的困难
> 除非此组件仅在此地方使用并且只使用一次,否则还是建议先注册再使用
7815048335453190777.target:
This method also supports directly specifying the component definition, but it is not recommended as it can make maintenance more difficult.  
> Unless this component is used only in this one place and only once, it is still recommended to register it first before using it.

messageParts: 此方法单纯为表单更新值,也就是模型到视图

1763898646512759828.text: 比如JsonSchema中的`anyOf`,`oneOf`,可以轻松使用`v.intersect`,`v.union`对应的`FieldLogicGroup`进行动态切换处理
messageParts: 比如JsonSchema中的`anyOf`,`oneOf`,可以轻松使用`v.intersect`,`v.union`对应的`FieldLogicGroup`进行动态切换处理
1763898646512759828.target: For example, `anyOf` and `oneOf` in JsonSchema can be easily handled dynamically using the corresponding `FieldLogicGroup` with `v.intersect` and `v.union`.

messageParts: 用于调整表单控件使用,非表单控件不需要
8453387105142299540.target: Used for adjusting form control usage; non-form controls do not require it.

8787739137583531710.text: 由于存在`wrapper`,所以布局的时候,顶层的组件不一定是定义组件,而有可能是wrapper,所以就需要使用此类进行设置
messageParts: 由于存在`wrapper`,所以布局的时候,顶层的组件不一定是定义组件,而有可能是wrapper,所以就需要使用此类进行设置
8787739137583531710.target: Due to the existence of `wrapper`, when laying out, the top-level component may not necessarily be the defined component, but could be a `wrapper`, so it is necessary to use this class for configuration.

1817036115592330459.text: 由于类型安全的原因,设计上不支持切换
messageParts: 由于类型安全的原因,设计上不支持切换
1817036115592330459.target: Due to type safety considerations, switching is not supported in the design.

2533280580905361738.text: 皮影为不同框架提供统一的表单开发体验
messageParts: 皮影为不同框架提供统一的表单开发体验
2533280580905361738.target: Piying provides a unified form development experience across different frameworks.

7637968389472122461.text: 皮影允许在这两个阶段内分别进行处理,完成更复杂的业务逻辑
messageParts: 皮影允许在这两个阶段内分别进行处理,完成更复杂的业务逻辑
7637968389472122461.target: Piying allows processing in these two phases separately, enabling more complex business logic to be completed.

messageParts: 皮影可以用在哪里?

2484941805385105442.text: 皮影在所有库/框架上都实现了`ControlValueAccessor`(来自Angular)的概念,通过实现相关方法,使组件能够自动接入控件
messageParts: 皮影在所有库/框架上都实现了`ControlValueAccessor`(来自Angular)的概念,通过实现相关方法,使组件能够自动接入控件
2484941805385105442.target: Piying implements the concept of `ControlValueAccessor` (from Angular) on all libraries/frameworks, allowing components to automatically integrate with form controls by implementing the relevant methods.

7789523330151719193.text: 皮影如何支持不同平台
messageParts: 皮影如何支持不同平台
7789523330151719193.target: How does Piying support different platforms

2493761949270948335.text: 皮影完全兼容`valibot`的所有Action,可以完美的利用其验证及转换机制
messageParts: 皮影完全兼容`valibot`的所有Action,可以完美的利用其验证及转换机制
2493761949270948335.target: Piying is fully compatible with all Actions of `valibot` and can perfectly utilize its validation and transformation mechanisms.

7636767885225758128.text: 皮影对于大多数普通的表单功能都已经完全覆盖,所以下面列举的问题是皮影相较于主流库而言解决
messageParts: 皮影对于大多数普通的表单功能都已经完全覆盖,所以下面列举的问题是皮影相较于主流库而言解决
7636767885225758128.target: Piying has already fully covered most of the common form functions, so the issues listed below are problems that Piying addresses compared to mainstream libraries.

7968906376000502175.text:
皮影成功解决了这个问题,使得定义与视图并非耦合关系,允许任意显示与调整
> 这样,你就可以定制属于设计要求的表单而不是有限的展示
messageParts:
皮影成功解决了这个问题,使得定义与视图并非耦合关系,允许任意显示与调整
> 这样,你就可以定制属于设计要求的表单而不是有限的展示
7968906376000502175.target:
Piying successfully addresses this issue, allowing definitions and views to be decoupled, and enabling arbitrary display and adjustment.  
> This way, you can customize forms according to your specific design requirements, rather than being limited to predefined presentations.

1441961653256688942.text: 皮影是一个依赖 valibot 的元数据定义遍历/解析器
messageParts: 皮影是一个依赖 valibot 的元数据定义遍历/解析器
1441961653256688942.target: piying is a metadata definition traverser/parser that depends on valibot

5921239532975014120.text: 皮影的相关设置更加语义化,减少开发心智;并允许自定义封装
messageParts: 皮影的相关设置更加语义化,减少开发心智;并允许自定义封装
5921239532975014120.target: The settings related to Piying are more semantic, reducing the cognitive load for developers, and allow for custom encapsulation.

messageParts: 绝大多数表单,只做了`Group`,`Array`,`Control`三种控件,但是缺少了逻辑或/与,这就让某些逻辑实现变得复杂
5493866923233199135.target: Most forms only implement three types of controls: `Group`, `Array`, and `Control`, but they are missing logical operators such as OR/AND, which makes certain logical implementations more complex.

7009354589966945087.target: Most forms lack type safety, and even when using metadata definitions, components cannot be moved arbitrarily; they can only be displayed in the order of their definitions.

6429650137716363702.target: Path queries are used in actions such as `outputChange`, `valueChange`, `hideWhen`, and `disableWhen`.

7892116980067536207.text: 通过`valibot`定义,可以天然的获取到类型,并且获得最基础的类型验证,保证任何情况下,数据的类型没有问题
messageParts: 通过`valibot`定义,可以天然的获取到类型,并且获得最基础的类型验证,保证任何情况下,数据的类型没有问题
7892116980067536207.target: Through `valibot` definitions, you can naturally obtain the type and get the most basic type validation, ensuring that the data type is always correct under any circumstances.

messageParts:
通过使用`field.get([])`可以查询定义的`组件`配置
> 即使非表单控件,也可以查询,只不过返回的配置中没有控件引用
211474697240626646.target:
By using `field.get([])`, you can query the defined `component` configuration  
> Even for non-form controls, the query is possible, but the returned configuration does not include control references.

4401278516210119299.text:
通过分组可以定义`card`,`tabs`,`navbar`等容器,使控件以不同风格展示
> 在一定程度上替代了[slot](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Reference/Elements/slot)
messageParts:
通过分组可以定义`card`,`tabs`,`navbar`等容器,使控件以不同风格展示
> 在一定程度上替代了[slot](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Reference/Elements/slot)
4401278516210119299.target:
By grouping, you can define containers such as `card`, `tabs`, and `navbar`, allowing controls to be displayed in different styles  
> To a certain extent, it replaces the [slot](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Reference/Elements/slot)

4822148391498864378.text: 通过定义不同的元数据与元数据解析器,适应不同工作场景
messageParts: 通过定义不同的元数据与元数据解析器,适应不同工作场景
4822148391498864378.target: By defining different metadata and metadata parsers, adapt to different working scenarios

8449255988302560808.text: 通过指定元数据定义,使得类型安全定义可以被解析并被orm使用
messageParts: 通过指定元数据定义,使得类型安全定义可以被解析并被orm使用
8449255988302560808.target: By specifying metadata definitions, type-safe definitions can be parsed and used by ORM.

3963725331977485171.text: 通过添加元数据支持,使得Orm定义与类型定义合二为一,方便管理
messageParts: 通过添加元数据支持,使得Orm定义与类型定义合二为一,方便管理
3963725331977485171.target: By adding metadata support, the ORM definition and type definition are combined into one, making management more convenient.

2224996665555967134.text: 通过皮影的解析加持后,相关验证可以完美的反馈到表单上,使前后端的检查相同,减少维护成本,提高了数据的安全性
messageParts: 通过皮影的解析加持后,相关验证可以完美的反馈到表单上,使前后端的检查相同,减少维护成本,提高了数据的安全性
2224996665555967134.target: After the analysis and enhancement provided by Piying, the relevant verification can be perfectly reflected on the form, making the front-end and back-end checks consistent, reducing maintenance costs, and improving data security.

messageParts: 默认下动态解析后,大多数场景都可以直接使用
5119919885418919135.target: By default, after dynamic parsing, most scenarios can be used directly.

6735707648165510781.text: 默认下直接触发变更,设置`updateOn:'blur'`后要等待`touched`发射
messageParts: 默认下直接触发变更,设置`updateOn:'blur'`后要等待`touched`发射
6735707648165510781.target: By default, changes are triggered directly. After setting `updateOn: 'blur'`, you need to wait for the `touched` event to be emitted.

7727666512987859558.text: 默认为替换当前类,也可以设置`true`合并已有类
messageParts: 默认为替换当前类,也可以设置`true`合并已有类
7727666512987859558.target: By default, it replaces the current class, but you can also set it to `true` to merge with existing classes.

messageParts: 默认值

9031301241060936147.text: 默认情况下,比如使用`v.string()`时,会自动查找注册的`string`配置;但是您也可以使用此方法手动指定
messageParts: 默认情况下,比如使用`v.string()`时,会自动查找注册的`string`配置;但是您也可以使用此方法手动指定
9031301241060936147.target: By default, for example when using `v.string()`, it will automatically look up the registered `string` configuration; however, you can also use this method to manually specify it.

7063127021049097214.text: 默认情况下,由于valibot为强类型定义,所以所有输入默认为表单控件,如果想要定义为非表单控件,可以使用`v.optional(v.void())`,表示一个不可能的值
messageParts: 默认情况下,由于valibot为强类型定义,所以所有输入默认为表单控件,如果想要定义为非表单控件,可以使用`v.optional(v.void())`,表示一个不可能的值
7063127021049097214.target: By default, since valibot is strongly typed, all inputs are considered form controls by default. If you want to define them as non-form controls, you can use `v.optional(v.void())`, which represents an impossible value.

6654936285331109296.text: 默认提供了一个基础的object组件,用来展示内部子组件

6654936285331109296.target: A basic object component is provided by default to display internal child components.
